message_1:
What is the average monthly sales of a company over the past year, given the following data of monthly sales (in thousands of dollars) from January to December: 

January - 100 

February - 150 

March - 120 

April - 180 

May - 200 

June - 250 

July - 300 

August - 275 

September - 225 

October - 190 

November - 150 

December - 120
message_2:
To find the average monthly sales, we need to add up the sales for each month and then divide by the number of months (12).

January - 100
February - 150
March - 120
April - 180
May - 200
June - 250
July - 300
August - 275
September - 225
October - 190
November - 150
December - 120

Total sales = 100 + 150 + 120 + 180 + 200 + 250 + 300 + 275 + 225 + 190 + 150 + 120 = 2360

Now, we divide the total sales by the number of months:

Average monthly sales = 2360 / 12 = 196.67 (rounded to two decimal places)

So, the average monthly sales of the company over the past year is $196.67 thousand.
